headerSubtitle: You can contact us any time!
aboutUsTitle: We can make a deal in several ways

aboutUsItems.title: On the spot
aboutUsItems.content: You are more then welcome to come to our place with your car. Our location can be found at the bottom of the page.

aboutUsItems.title: Contact form
aboutUsItems.content: There is a well designed contact form. Enter the data about your car, and expect our call very soon. :)

aboutUsItems.title: Phone or mail
aboutUsItems.content: You are free to contact us at any time via phone or mail, and in any form you want. Scroll up to find our contact data.

aboutTitle: We specialize in buying cars in and around Munich or Bavaria

aboutItems.title: All brands
aboutItems.content: We buy vehicles of all brands, even if it is made in Yugoslavia :)

aboutItems.title: All types
aboutItems.content: We do not care is it city car, limo, van, truck, or even dredge

aboutItems.title: All conditions
aboutItems.content: We also have nothing against old, accident, and long travelers vehicles
